page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: The majority of houses in the area are {farmhouses and cottages}built in the late 19th century to the early 20th century. The predominant building material is{granite}which was available from local quarries and {slate tiles}cover the roofs. All of these older houses have large numbers of chimneys due to the importance of coal fires in the household to heat the house and to cook food. Many of the houses have{bow windows}at the front to allow light to fill the front rooms. Some also have{sash {windows}as the houses were built before the introduction of{casement {windows. The large farmhouses are situated in their own large grounds whereas the farm cottages can often be found in
